title: FutureCHEM INTERNATIONAL 2023
description: FutureCHEM INTERNATIONAL is the new platform for conference and exhibition focusing on innovative solutions for the Chemical Industry. This new concept show is collocated with Thailand LAB INTERNATIONAL. FutureCHEM INTERNATIONAL emphasizes on raw materials, chemical engineering technology, processing technology and innovative chemical technology focusing on petrochemical, food and supplement, pharmaceutical and cosmetic industry in the initial stage. FutureCHEM INTERNATIONAL present in both exhibition showcases and intense seminar, along side with Thailand LAB INTL’and Bio Asia Pacific at the same place.
